com.team23.weather.gui

Class ChangeUnitsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.team23.weather.gui.ChangeUnitsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocaleObserver, IWeatherDataObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ChangeUnitsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ILocaleObserver, IWeatherDataObserver
    A ChangeUnitsPanel extends JPanel. A ChangeUnitsPanel implements the IWeatherDataObserver interface, to listen for weather changes. A ChangeUnitsPanel implements the ILocaleObserver interface, to listen to locale changes. A ChangeUnitsPanel displays the date the weather was last updated, and allows the user to change the LocaleSettings to "Metric" or "Imperial". Changing these settings will write the Configuration to a file called "config.json".
    Author:
    Andrew Bloch-Hansen, Saquib Mian
    See Also:
    App, ScrollableGui, RefreshAction, ILocaleObserver, IWeatherDataObserver, JPanel, Serialized Form
